item.title: Azure Management Groups, as Code
item.description: This guide will give you an introduction to use Management Groups in Azure and how to create them as code. If you want to try this out yourself as a lab, you must first ensure that you have the pre-requisites ready. This guide depends on the following: Tool Link Azure Bicep Cli Bicep Cli install instructions VSCode + Bicep Extension Getting Up And Ready With VSCode and VSCode Productivity hints Azure Powershell Setup Azure Powershell Azure Account Register Free Azure Account User account with sufficient privileges to create Management Groups in the Tenant Root group Register Free Azure Account (See the “Enable Management Groups” section) ManagementGroup Structure ManagementGroups are basically containers that contains your organisations subscriptions.
